title: Dom, v kotorom ya zhivu - The House I Live (1957 - Soviet Union)
description:
Dom, v kotorom ya zhivu (1957 - Soviet Union)

The House I Live In                                       Ð”Ð¾Ð¼, Ð² ÐºÐ¾Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ€Ð¾Ð¼ Ñ Ð¶Ð¸Ð²Ñƒ

Drama / War
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0167900/


Some very real people, Russian people, enter and leave "The House I Live In," as World War II thunders in the background. This is the sum and substance of a quiet, thoughtful and moving drama from Gorky Film Studios that pivots on the power of simple suggestion. This release was a major award-winner at the Brussels International Film Festival.

With the war itself almost impersonally relegated to the distance, a series of vignettes sketches the war's effects on a handful of apartment neighbors in Moscow. 


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x598, 25.000 fps, 1800 Kbps, 01h34m27s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, 6 channel, 384 kbps

DVDRip, Russian audio, optional subtitles English, Russian, Vietnamese
